creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: two-paneled white tzute woven on a back strap loom with three-stripe 3" wide horizontal sections in a red-purple-red fashion; two 3/4 wide vertical purple and green stripes decorate the panel's edges; weave's texture woven with loose and twisted weft threads (called "Chivito" in Guatemala); fringes at each end
dimension: 51 x 46 in. (129.54 x 116.84 cm) (including 2 in. fringe)
title: Cloth (tzute)
